page.title: 04Roundshaw Today
page.content:
This is what it is like to live on the Roundshaw Estate by Daniel Simpson, Richard Hall and Tracey Ballard;Age 10. Roundshaw is a very boring estate. There is nothing to do but there is a lovely girl called Sherneen. We fancy her. She lives in a white house on Brancker Close. We are careful when we are out because there are bullies on the estate. Some of the decks are quite good to live on. We play on the grass but there are signs saying "No ball games." Lucky people live in the country. Our mums would like to live in a Wimpy house with a garden. At week- ends we go to Beddington Park where there are fields and a river.
By Roundshaw School
